thread.section_title: probikekit.ca Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of probikekit.ca | probikekit.ca
thread.title: Danny

author: Danny
title: Danny
text:
Great service from PBK.. nothing but numerous good experiences here.
But often I'll get a COD bill from Canadian customs at almost random. Not sure that's a probikekit problem but if they knew when a shipment advertised as "free shipping" would incur customs charges if they could alert us customers so it wouldn't be a negative surprise that would be amazing. I love receiving my orders but the elation is muted when they say "but you owe $50 before we can release this to you." Again, not PBK's fault but something to be aware of perhaps.
